name: Create A Legendary Ball
description:
Looking forward to your suggest.You can download the full version at GooglePlay.See you on the leaderboard :)

1.Draw lines to keep the ball moving forward.The more distance you reach the more energy you can use next time.

2. Make use of the power ups and avoid obstacles. (Lines can block missile )

3.Consume energy to unlock new balls with different abilities,Upgrade balls to improve and pass on abilities.Finally Create A Legendary Ball!
